item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Wear a nice warm hat, gloves, coat and shoes..

WEATHER: http://www.usairnet.com/cgi-bin/launch/code.cgi?Submit=Go&sta=KBDL&state=CT

SEE YA THERE IF YOU ARE INTERESTED.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Look at the fear on the faces of the Paddlers, watch them take their last frantic breath of fresh air (not even enough time to scream) before going under the rapids right in front of your eyes , almost in arms reach from you.. Yeah you can also imagine the cold of the water filling their underclothes to a drenching ice bath..or if they pee their pants at that moment--its a shot of warm before the COLD ending ahead !........Cheer em on i say..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A nice rain storm a few day earlier will have us cheer on the racers even more as they submarine through the rapids to our delight.

 

Potluck after party will be at a home nearby (Directions given out at the event since its too confusing to add them in this event write up).

When: As with every event i list, we have no idea untill  the main activity is over and that varies greatly, then we decide when and where.

Keep your food in the cooler  in the car or get it on the way..etc..

I am bringing Chocolate things..

-----------------------------------.

 

I am happy to list this event again for the few of us interested  that want to get out to CHEER ON THE RACERS and have a nice Home-style  Pot Luck Party afterward at a nearby location.

Besides what else are you going to do on this day ????..

Its a time to either sit "rapid side"  (bring your chair) or walk upstream to see whats going on with the 3 foot drop and submarine spot so there is some excersize for ya too.

This seems like a great event to make some top quality Almond Milk Hot Chocolate from ground raw coaca beans and sweetened with honey... maybe a pinch of cinnamon too.. a touch of cayane pepper if desired to keep ya warm in other ways..

Mmm Hot Chocolate reminds me of mesmerizing Brown Eyes...

 

Updates are being added: http://www.scanticspringsplash.org/

 

I will be wearing an "ORANGE HUNTING HAT and an ORANGE VEST"  riverside at the rapids !

al-r

 

Parking: some spots are nearby on a few nearby roads  (I will park at the Church or closer this year)   but this is an alternate:

**FREE SHUTTLE SERVICE**

SCANTIC SPRING SPLASH
SPECTATOR SHUTTLE

Click on the picture above for a map.

FREE spectator parking will be available at the staff parking lot of Fermi High School (corner of North Maple Street and Moody Road).  The free shuttle bus will provide spectators a worry free trip to and from the Powder Mill Barn on race day.  The bus will run from 11:30 am until about one half hour after the end of the race.

Come and enjoy the race, and don’t worry about finding a parking space at Powder Hollow.

Remember to bring a food item to help fill our canoe for the Enfield Food Shelf.
